#summary Quick Start for widget setup

= Introduction =

Widget reacts on single click by tapping on it's icon on home screen.

= Installation = 

_Use Android Market for installation because automated update support._
After successful installation place a widget on the home screen.
Single time Configuration will appear and ask you for BT state behaviour after call ended.
Select one of the options and press "Menu" button to display options menu with "Save" option.

*Changing BT behaviour* requires placing new widget on home screen where again will single time configuration appear. You can delete the additional widget afterwards.

= Details =

Configuration is stored in shared preferences mode and is loaded each time the device is booted.
